title: Coronavirus Updates - New Restrictions, Moderna's Vaccine & Thanksgiving During the Pandemic
itunes:title: Coronavirus Updates - New Restrictions, Moderna's Vaccine & Thanksgiving During the Pandemic
description:
Surging COVID-19 cases lead to statewide restrictions, drugmaker Moderna announces a 95% effective coronavirus vaccine, and nearly half of all Americans cancel their Thanksgiving plans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
